transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji very good afternoon, Sarani ji.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir main Pooja Sharma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Kaise ho sir aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir aapka ek
Customer: Wo number save nahi kiya aapne wo save kiya tha wo number?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Wo number maine aapka save kar rakha hai na dusra number hai aapka?
Executive: Sir aapne 22 tarikh ko ek call kiya tha na IndiaMART ke customer care number pe aapne bataya kuch by leads kuch product ke bare mein aap jankari chahte the.
Customer: Haan lead nahi aa rahi hai mere ko jo main main product hai na uski lead chahiye wo nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: By leads nahi aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Abhi jaise sir aapke jo main product hai aapne mujhe us din bataye the.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap all India mein deal karte hain. Abhi sir aap online hai mobile pe ya laptop pe?
Customer: Nahi abhi to online nahi hu main.
Executive: Online nahi ho. Sir dekhiye main yaha pe aapka jo account
Customer: Kitne baje? Haan haan boliye sun raha hu sun raha hu boliye.
Executive: Ji main bol rahi thi sir aapke account pe main check kar rahi hu by leads to sir kafi achi aa rakhi hai.
Executive: Aur main aapko bata bhi deti hu by leads.
Executive: Jaise aap bata rahe the ki main pan India mein deal karta hu.
Executive: To yaha pe dekhiye sabse pehli jo by lead aa rahi hai sir aapke liye.
Executive: Gas cutting torch. Thik hai ye by lead aayi hui hai sir aapke liye.
Executive: Mau Uttar Pradesh se. Thik hai. Quantity hai 1000 pieces. Fuel gas type LPG hai. Aur sir yaha pe order value hai 16 se 18 lakh.
Executive: Buyer bhi jo hai sir char saal purana hai to ye wali by lead aapki bilkul kaam ki hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Konsi?
Executive: Uske alawa sir
Customer: 16 se 18 lakh rupees?
Executive: Ji. Hello.
Customer: Order value kitna hai?
Customer: Order value sir yaha to 16 se 18 lakh rupees dikha raha hai.
Customer: Kaha par?
Executive: Sir aapke seller panel mein.
Customer: Main IndiaMART khol raha hu aap bataye aap kaha pe kholu main?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ka application open kariye. Haan main bata deti hu. Ek do minute mein aapko karta hu call karta hu ek do minute. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai sir. Okay. Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads for main products.

Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account.

- Executive informed about a buylead for gas cutting torch.

- Executive provided details of the buylead.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the seller panel.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product, order value
